column2: the reason to come and try it
column3: is the food! They put a lot into the cooking process
column4: marinating their meat for days ahead of time and then working the smoker over night. They actually have night-shift chefs that work the smoker while most people are sleeping. All of this creates that delicious
column5: truly smoked food you will see in my pictures. Take a look at that pink smoke ring on the meat! Way to go chefs!
